alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 23 at 12:59PM MST until January 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility as low as 1/4 mile in dense fog. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine County, Hill County, Northern Blaine County, and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some clearing will occur this afternoon, however, dense fog is expected to redevelop this evening and continue into Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Western and Central Chouteau County
